Method Detail

askForMonth

public static String askForMonth()
Using modal window it asks user to insert month in MM/yyyy format. If not valid, query is repeated after error message. The inserted String is returned.

Parameters:
y - a sample parameter for a method
Returns:
the sum of x and y

createImageIcon

Creates ImageIcon object out of given path.

Parameters:
path - path to file
description - description of the icon
Returns:
ImageIcon object
